reviews.review: Cheaters, hackers, griefers, surfs, generally toxic players to put it mildly. That is just the tip of the iceberg of problems this game has. I have been playing CS in many of its forms over the years, from 1.6, Source and now GO, but I HAD ENOUGH. This is garbage, cesspool of the most immature players on the internet. Until you implement working anti-cheat and start to actually ban for life those who abuse game mechanics i cannot recommend this to anyone. And don't let me start about the hidden gambling mechanizmus embedded in the game. I cannot believe i have ever payed for this. FIX YOUR GAME!
Só tem muitos Hackers, isso atrapalha quem quer jogar sério...
jogo é bom mano so falto se bom
do i actually write a review on this game... if you don't know this game..  you are not a gamer........
So much fun! Best FPS game that has aged well! thanks valve!

Spent a lot of time in this game on this and my second account as well, more than 3000 hours total for this day. To be honest this game is a big big disappointment with screaming/griefing kids, also add tons of cheaters here and you'll probably get the worst game u can ever imagine, but i still do recommend this 'so called game' because it's probably the best 'thing' were u can train your aim and gaming skills in general. If you do well here then ALMOST EVERY(not every single one) shooter will be a peace of cake for you. Overall the game is good but the problems listed above are A BIG MINUS. Anyway, still  8/10.
玩儿16年cs了  csgo不错  但是就是挂太多
Great game, loads of hacking if you don't buy prime or deal with the hackers until level 21.

Simplesmente ridículo, você comprar um jogo que não é barato pra ficar passando nervoso, oque era pra se divertir e passar tempo vira uma desgraça, com gente que só pode ter a educação esfolada no asfalto, tanto com desrespeito quanto com hack, infelizmente é um lixo que eu gosto de jogar, mas não tem condições, não recomendo a ninguém que não tenha muita paciência.(cheio de hack, por ser um jogo pago tinha de minimizar muito, parece até Combat Arms na sua pior época , cheio de crianças que adoram xingar e trollar a partida dos outros...)
it is a very good game
